entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15 except minus 10 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 15 except minus 10 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5 except plus 3 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5 except plus 3 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 15.
